Instance.description: An interaction that cancels itself if the tuned state conditions are met. if object has function on_interaction_canceled_from_state_change a fn (interaction, new_state_value)->viud that will be called when the interaction ends up cancelled

TunableTuple.name: cancel_state_test
TunableTuple.description: the state test to run when the object's state changes. If this test passes, the interaction will cancel

TunableVariant.name: fallback_behavior
TunableVariant.description: What to do if the given object doesn't have the state in question.

Tunable.name: test_individual
Tunable.description: If true, the test will pass if any of the objects meet the criteria. If false, all objects have meet them.

TunableEnum.name: who
TunableEnum.description: Who or what to apply this test to.

TunableVariant.name: required_station
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, specifies the radio station this affordance listens to. Normally this is provided by the object's Stereo component and does not need to be tuned here.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The station that this affordance listens to.
